name: Fall of Zombies
description:
It all begun with a choice. A choice to be human or to go against humanity. what so ever your choice would be, I am going to fight for my race.

Team Name : WildChild

Gameplay Instructions : Use WASD to move, Left mouse click to shoot, right mouse click to ADS, Space to jump, left shift to sprint, ctrl to crouch, ESC to exit

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

- POLYGON - Military Pack by Synty Studios

- Toon Zombies &  Toon Soldiers - Armies by PolygonBlacksmith
